languages.text: Все атаки этого существа дополнительно наносят <u>(от 6 до 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}электрического урона{/g} в радиусе 3 клеток. Цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −50 и в случае провала получает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.
languages.original_text: All attacks of this creature deal an additional <u>(from 6 to 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} in a 3-cell radius and inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} unless the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

languages.text: [draft] An AoE attack that slows targets for 2 rounds on a failed TOU check.

traits.locale_text: [draft] An AoE attack that slows targets for 2 rounds on a failed TOU check.

languages.text: 此生物的所有攻击，都会对3格内的所有生物额外造成<u>6-12</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}电击伤害{/g}，被击中的所有生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且此次检定会承受-50{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。未能通过检定的目标会受到{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}效果影响，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: All attacks of this creature deal an additional <u>(from 6 to 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} in a 3-cell radius and inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} unless the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物的所有攻击，都会对3格内的所有生物额外造成<u>6到12</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}电击伤害{/g}，被击中的所有生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且此次检定会承受-50{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。未能通过检定的目标会受到{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}影响，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

此生物的所有攻击，都会对3格内的所有生物额外造成<u>6-12</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}电击伤害{/g}，被击中的所有生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且此次检定会承受-50{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。未能通过检定的目标会受到{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: その生物の全ての攻撃は半径3セル以内に追加で<u>6～12</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}ショックダメージ{/g}を与え、 2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}効果を与える。ターゲットは−50の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功すれば避けることができる。
languages.original_text: All attacks of this creature deal an additional <u>(from 6 to 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} in a 3-cell radius and inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} unless the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: その生物の全ての攻撃は半径3セル以内に追加で<u>6から12</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}ショックダメージ{/g}を与え、 2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を与える。ターゲットは−50の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功すれば避けることができる。

その生物の全ての攻撃は半径3セル以内に追加で<u>6～12</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}ショックダメージ{/g}を与え、 2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を与える。ターゲットは−50の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功すれば避けることができる。

languages.text: Todos los ataques de esta criatura infligen <u>(de 6 a 12)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}daño de conmoción{/g} adicional en un radio de 3 casillas e infligen el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} a menos que el objetivo supere una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −50.
languages.original_text: All attacks of this creature deal an additional <u>(from 6 to 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} in a 3-cell radius and inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} unless the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Todos los ataques de esta criatura infligen <u>de 6 a 12</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}daño de conmoción{/g} adicional en un radio de 3 casillas e infligen el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} a menos que el objetivo supere una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −50.

languages.text: Alle Angriffe dieser Kreatur verursachen zusätzlich <u>(6 bis 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}Schockschaden{/g} in einem Radius von 3 Feldern und bewirken 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang den Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g}, es sei denn, das Ziel besteht eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −50.
languages.original_text: All attacks of this creature deal an additional <u>(from 6 to 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} in a 3-cell radius and inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} unless the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Alle Angriffe dieser Kreatur verursachen zusätzlich <u>von 6 bis 12</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}Schockschaden{/g} in einem Radius von 3 Feldern und fügen den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g} für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} zu, es sei denn, das Ziel besteht eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -50.

languages.text: Toutes les attaques de cette créature infligent <u>(de 6 à 12)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}dégâts d'électrocution{/g} supplémentaires dans un rayon de 3 cases et appliquent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, sauf si la cible réussit un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −50.
languages.original_text: All attacks of this creature deal an additional <u>(from 6 to 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} in a 3-cell radius and inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} unless the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Toutes les attaques de cette créature infligent <u>6 à 12</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}dégâts d'électrocution{/g} supplémentaires dans un rayon de 3 cases et appliquent l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, sauf si la cible réussit un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -50.

languages.text: Bu yaratığın tüm saldırıları, 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde ilave <u>(6 ila 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}şok hasarı{/g} verir. Ayrıca hedef, −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçemezse {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlama{/g} etkisine sebep olur. bu etki 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: All attacks of this creature deal an additional <u>(from 6 to 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} in a 3-cell radius and inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} unless the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
